welcome_text: YUKON is a distribution company that has been operating and successfully developing in the Ukrainian fast-moving consumer goods market since 2000. The company's concept is the fast connection between the buyer and the manufacturer. Our clients receive a wide range of products and service at the highest level. We represent the products of many well-known brands and manufacturers. We work with local and national retail outlets, gas stations, pharmacies, and HORECA.

about.heading: WE ARE A RELIABLE PARTNER IN THE FAST MOVING WORLD
about.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
about.experience: YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN THE MARKET
about.paragraph_1: YUKON was created to improve and enhance the quality of life. Throughout its history, Yukon has gained a position as a reliable partner in the supply and sale of quality food products.
about.paragraph_2: We have been engaged in retail and wholesale trade for 25 years. We work directly with manufacturers who have impeccable reputations, which excludes the receipt of substandard goods or counterfeits.
about.paragraph_3: We have agreements for exclusive representation with well-known European brands, whose products we represent in Ukraine. Thanks to direct contracts with major suppliers such as IDS, Carlsberg, and PepsiCo, we guarantee quality as well as competitive cost.
about.paragraph_4: The main groups of goods we work with:
about.li_item_3: Groceries (pasta, canned food, oils and sauces)
about.paragraph_5: YUKON is not just distribution. We are a whole ecosystem of enterprises, including: urban and regional logistics, commercial real estate and warehouse premises, as well as a whole list of our own projects. The company's goal is to provide your shelves to get into the heart of any consumer.
about.paragraph_6: Satisfied customers are the best reward for conscientious work. We do not stop at what has been achieved and confidently move forward!

projects.heading: our projects
projects.twin:
TM TwinSocks is a patented trademark in the socks industry, established in 2016, which has quickly won the hearts of many Ukrainians.

We produce not only stylish and comfortable socks and tights but also prioritize the quality of our products.
projects.fish:
Love Fish. We offer LIVE fish from our own aquafarm: African catfish (Clarius).

We have our own certified production of smoked and salted fish. We also offer a wide range of chilled, frozen fish, and seafood from our partners.
projects.beer:
The Hmіl - is the largest selection of draft beer in the city of Kovel! Namely, 20 types of draft beer!!! The range includes products from the Carlsberg Group, as well as Ukrainian craft producers.

The store presents a range of fish products for beer from our own production Love Fish! The Hmіl - is 50 seats for a perfect evening with company! We broadcast ALL sports events on the big screen! Come to relax with us!!!
projects.beerton: Beerton - this is what we consider a new format of an establishment where you can try wonderful dishes prepared in our kitchen and purchase products that we represent in the Volyn region to take a part of this establishment with you.
projects.chargers:
The number of electric vehicles on the roads of Ukraine is growing, and we understand the importance of creating charging infrastructure for their owners, moving towards an ecological future.

Stations operate in Kovel and Kyiv.
projects.kovcheg: Kovcheg is a company that occupies a leading position in the food distribution market in the Rivne region, thanks to mutually beneficial cooperation with suppliers and quality service for customers provided by a team of professionals.
projects.gradus: There are many secrets to a successful dish: high-quality ingredients, cooking method, combination of flavors, adding sauces, and so on. Another important and obvious secret is the love always added to our chefs' work. We always cook with love and care for you!

partners.heading: Only verified partners choose to cooperate with us to ensure the quality of products and service for their customers.
partners.paragraph: Yukon Company is the official distributor of well-known brands in the Volyn region. Our team of trade agents seeks ways to increase sales volume, promotes and promotes the product. Our goal is to make the service or product available to consumers. We are responsible for meeting the sales standard and guaranteeing the development of your TM.
partners.paragraph_2: We look forward with optimism, helping our partners work and contribute to Victory with us.

news.heading: Check out our latest news
news.electro_heading: 160 kW for Electric Vehicles in Kyiv
news.electro_description:
We are pleased to announce that we have installed a fast charging station for electric vehicles in the city of Kyiv in partnership with GO TO-U. The new charging station is located at: 34B Stepana Bandery Avenue, Kyiv, Ukraine, 04073.

The Blockbuster shopping center is an important step in developing infrastructure for electric transport in our country, and we are proud to contribute to environmental conservation and support for clean technologies.
news.army_description:
We stay in touch and actively support those who protect us. Making donations and providing necessary assistance to various brigades of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Many of our employees have joined the Defense Forces and are performing combat missions in various directions.

We constantly communicate with them, know their needs, and every time we try to provide soldiers' requests to the maximum. From the outset of the full-scale invasion to the present day, we have been supplying products from our warehouses to the front. We have sent our own vehicles to purchase drones, pickups, and other vehicles for the army's needs. We have done and continue to do everything for the desired Victory!
news.solar_heading: Ecological Autonomy of Our Projects: 28 Shevchenko St., Kovel
news.solar_description:
We care about the environment and strive to provide our projects with clean energy. A year ago, we made our main office in Kovel autonomous using solar energy.

Now we are working towards the autonomy of our electric vehicle charging station and other projects. The task is to make Yukon and all its projects autonomous using environmentally friendly technologies. We are actively working to ensure that our initiatives contribute to environmental conservation.
news.soccer_heading: Mascot T-shirt: ‘Lvivske’ Sponsor of the National Team of Ukraine
news.soccer_description: Since January 2021, the brand ‘Lvivske’ has become the new National sponsor of the Ukrainian football team. Mudryk, Dovbyk, and others have given their autographs! Now this T-shirt adorns the wall of the Hmіl pub.
news.hoverla_heading: Conquering Peaks Together with the Team
news.hoverla_description:
In the summer of 2017, together with our team, we climbed Hoverla, the highest peak in Ukraine. This event became a symbol of our cohesion and readiness for new challenges.

We always strive to reach new heights, both in life and in our professional activities.
news.weekend_heading: Dear workers of the trade sector, dear colleagues!
news.weekend_description:
On the last Sunday of July, we celebrate our professional holiday with you. In these challenging times, when logistics chains are disrupted and entangled, trading faces difficult circumstances. Nevertheless, we unite and adapt to the realities of today.

Together, we demonstrate true professionalism and ingenuity on the path from manufacturer and supplier to consumer. In times of instability and rocket threat, we remain dedicated to our profession and strive to provide quality services to the residents of our region. Therefore, shops in our region operate continuously, offering ample goods and a wide range of products. Additionally, we actively support those who protect us, donating and providing necessary assistance to various military units.

So, let's not stop at what we have achieved and continue to work for the good of our country! On this festive day, we wish you to remain optimistic, successfully implement your plans, achieve positive results, develop, and strive for the best! We wish you robust health, stability, joy, and peaceful skies above your head! With best wishes, Yukon.
news.independence_heading: Yukon Company congratulates all of you on Independence Day!
news.independence_description:
Dear Ukrainians! Yukon Company congratulates all of you on Independence Day! In the times we live in, Independence has become very significant and costly for each of us. We give our most precious thing — the lives of our loved ones and compatriots...

So let us cherish every moment of peace, take care of each other, and respect those who protect and fight for us. Let us remain steadfast and unshakable, united and cohesive for the sake of our common, great, and long-awaited Victory!
news.sale_description:
PUB 'GRADUS': 1+1=3 promotion on Grimbergen beer for Independence Day.

Cafe BEERTON: 15% discount on any pizza for Independence Day. TWINSOCKS: 30% discount on the patriotic collection at TwinSocks stores in Lutsk, Rivne, Kovel, and online store on August 23-24. Celebrate with us!
news.zsy_heading: Thanks from the Armed Forces of Ukraine – This is our ongoing motivation!
news.zsy_description:
Today, the fate of our state lies in the hands of the servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, as the greatest burden of responsibility for the peace of citizens and the territorial integrity of the entire country rests on their shoulders. The strength of our army largely depends on the support from the home front. Therefore, helping our defenders is now the most important duty of every Ukrainian.

From the first days of the full-scale war with the Russian aggressor, the Yukon team, led by its management, has been actively assisting various brigades of the Armed Forces, striving to meet the needs of the military, from the smallest details to significant requests. For their charitable work, they have repeatedly received gratitude and certificates from the military.

On the eve of Independence Day, the Executive Director of Yukon Company, Yuriy Semenyuk, had the honor of receiving another token of gratitude from the 24th Separate Mechanized Brigade named after King Danylo for a significant contribution and substantial support in strengthening the country's defense capabilities. Gratitude from the Armed Forces of Ukraine is our ongoing motivation! This recognition is the merit of each of our employees! May God grant that our good deeds contribute to the approach of Victory and peace on Ukrainian land!
news.meeting_heading: Participation in the International Children's Fashion Exhibition
news.meeting_description:
On August 15-16, 2024, the International Children's Fashion Fair took place in Kyiv: A Platform for Business Partnership and Innovation. This is Ukraine's leading specialized B2B children's fashion exhibition.

It became a meeting place for professionals in the children's fashion industry, bringing together manufacturers, distributors, retailers, designers, and other representatives of the textile industry to showcase the latest collections, discuss future trends, and establish new business contacts. Once again, our company presented its collection at the exhibition.

TM TWINSOCKS offered a wide range of tights and socks for children of all sizes, in an impressive array of colors, and in various designs and styles for visitors to explore. The display featured a variety of children's products with bright prints to suit every choice and taste for little fashion lovers. The exhibition showcased numerous models of breathable tights for summer, as well as warm and comfortable models for the colder seasons, suitable for both girls and boys.

In addition, the exhibition collection included a range of practical, everyday, and festive models, perfect for modern active children who love to stay on trend. Overall, TM TWINSOCKS once again proved that the style, quality, and comfort of our products are worthy of your attention. So don’t hesitate, and quickly ‘find your pair’ with TM TWINSOCKS.
news.khmil_heading: Enjoy Beer and Relax with 'The Хміль'!
news.khmil_description_1:
Before jumping into an unknown body of water, it's wise to study its bottom.

The retail sector is leading in popularity for starting commercial activities. A particular niche in this segment is alcoholic retail, with 60% of it being beer sales. The steady demand for this product, affordable prices, and the presence of strong national producers contribute to the development of the beer business.

Beer is the oldest drink that has gained popularity for its ability to quench thirst. Its variety and range still attract consumers today.

With nearly a quarter-century of experience in beer distribution in the Volyn region, understanding the audience and existing competitors, Yukon decided to take the risk and open a beer shop. The beer retail segment is saturated with players. It has experience and resources on its side. That is why we chose a proven path and opted for a franchise from JSC Carlsberg Ukraine. Together with competent and experienced 'Carlsberg' managers, we assessed the strengths and weaknesses of the future business and developed an effective customer acquisition strategy. We went through a multi-stage quest from location scouting to the official opening.
news.khmil_description_2:
Thus, in April, a modern chain store of draft beer and related products The Хміль opened its doors for the first time in the elite new building of the residential complex 'Barcelona' (T. Borovets Street, 12a) in the city of Kovel. It features a wide selection of beer from popular domestic (Lviv Brewery) and foreign (Carlsberg, Warsteiner, Guinness, Grimbergen, etc.) producers, ranging from well-known classics to the latest examples. Our lineup includes over twenty varieties of draft beer, from tasty and light lagers reflecting the tastes and character of the country of origin to more interesting and exotic varieties, each with its own story.

16 types of beer are served in PET bottles and sold for takeout. Additionally, we have 8 beer taps for on-premise consumption. For connoisseurs, we offer craft beer. The store's assortment is crafted not only based on customers' taste preferences but also considering their changing moods. Each sip of our beer offers not only taste but also an emotion, allowing you to experience this seemingly well-known drink in a new way. Knowledgeable staff provide professional advice to meet even the most demanding customers' preferences. It is important to us that even the most demanding client leaves satisfied.

In addition to a variety of draft beer, 'The Хміль' also offers bottled beer of different styles, brands, and labels. To complement the slight bitterness of dark beers and the taste of slightly roasted malt in light beers, the shelves are stocked with numerous beer snacks, chips, nuts, dried and cured fish, and meat. For lovers of strong alcoholic beverages, the store features displays of popular and premium alcohol. For the ladies, we have a wide selection of low-alcohol and non-alcoholic drinks, wines, champagne, and cider. The store also offers treats for little sweet tooths. In the checkout area, there are stands with juices, waters, and children's products.
news.khmil_description_3:
The store format allows not only buying beer and snacks to go but also enjoying them on-site in a cozy, colorful atmosphere. The Kovel 'The Хміль' is divided into three areas: a sales floor, a small area with tasting counters and tables, and a spacious basement area that can accommodate a large number of seats (up to 100 people). Each area is equipped with a large TV and SMART TV, broadcasting domestic and international sports events. We offer comfortable relaxation for both small families and large groups of friends. You can gather friends, colleagues, and acquaintances, enjoy your favorite drink, and play board games. With an ideal combination of exclusive interior design, pleasant service, quality beer, and delicious snacks, you can relax and have a great time with us.

For customer convenience, The Хміль offers the possibility to place an advance order by phone at 0505128007. Even over the phone, our staff will provide accurate information about the assortment and quality of products and help you make the right choice. Additionally, visitors can use our service phone for their needs if required.

For a pleasant wake-up and motivation for an active start to the day, we offer fragrant coffee with a sweet surprise every morning. Coffee from 'The Хміль' energizes you for the entire day and fills it with optimism.

Of course, how could it be without this?! Our store regularly holds monthly promotions where you can enjoy attractive discounts and exclusive offers.

In the near future, we plan to launch a fast food kitchen and introduce a fast-food menu. Soon, our guests will be able to enjoy delicious burgers, fresh shawarma, hot pizza, and fries. An exciting surprise for visitors will be the expansion of our drink collection. 'The Хміль' will soon delight its customers with refreshing cocktails, both alcoholic and non-alcoholic.

The unique brand and image of our store are the keys to your satisfaction. Our main goal is to ensure that customers, regardless of the weather or their mood, find harmony of body and soul in our store. Therefore, we are open from 08:00 to 22:00 on weekdays and from 10:00 to 22:00 on weekends. Enjoy beer and relax with The Хміль!
news.wine_description_1:
Autumn is gaining momentum every day: each morning wraps us in chilly fog, each evening delights us with a charming sunset, sometimes angrily tearing dried leaves from trees and mercilessly soaking us with heavy cold rains.

At this time, we crave warmth, coziness, and something very special. Under the sounds of romantic music, in pleasant company, enjoying a glass of tart red wine, we long to indulge in something extraordinary… Elegant and delicious. Yum! A dream? No, reality!

On October 17 of this year, the residents of Kovel and guests of the city had a wonderful opportunity to fulfill their dreams and experience incredible gastronomic impressions during a gastronomic evening at the local PUB 'Gradus'.

On this occasion, the establishment prepared a special menu for its visitors, where each dish features a unique cooking technique and maximally reveals its flavor in combination with a favorite beverage.
news.wine_description_2:
For the attendees, our professional chefs prepared exclusive dishes that are culinary masterpieces of European haute cuisine. The guests of the evening enthusiastically savored steaks of meat and fish, indulged in the delicate delicacy 'Beef Tartare,' and enjoyed a cheese platter from the establishment.

The organizers of the event prepared an interesting program, during which the renowned Lutsk sommelier Volodymyr Temchenko and sommelier Maxym Smal conducted a tasting of 5 varieties of red wine from various regions of Portugal.

Each bottle of the presented beverage offers a new, unparalleled taste and aroma, each with its own character and story, which not only helps to escape the daily routine but also maximally highlights and complements the flavor bouquet of the food.

The highlight of the gastronomic evening was the wine Vilarissa Valley, Grande Reserva, Barao de Vilar, which combines a blend of aromas with delicate floral notes against a backdrop of dark red fruits, ripe dark berries, and prunes.
news.wine_description_3:
In a cozy atmosphere and pleasant company, attendees savored the rich taste and intoxicating aroma with each sip of the ruby red wine. During the gathering, the sommeliers warmly interacted with the guests, sharing insights about the culture of producing noble beverages, their storage techniques, and the art of consumption.

Overall, the gastro-evening delighted gourmets of exquisite dishes and connoisseurs of fine wine with its hospitality. So join us, and together let’s await new exciting offerings from PUB 'Gradus'!
news.estonia_heading: Meeting with Representatives of the Estonian Chamber of Commerce and Industry
news.estonia_description_1:
For many Ukrainian businesses, the full-scale invasion of russia marked a period of pivotal changes. Some companies ceased or suspended their operations. However, many others continued their work and even reached a new level despite shelling, occupation, instability, and financial risks.

In the conditions of wartime, Ukrainian state policy is aimed at the comprehensive development of economic business relations, particularly expanding the borders of international cooperation.

Currently, Volyn is relatively calm, which attracts significant interest from foreign business partners. In order to establish contacts and foster development in our region, on November 19 this year, a meeting took place between a delegation of Estonian entrepreneurs and Volyn business companies, with the participation of representatives of TM Twinsocks. The business forum was organized by the Volyn Chamber of Commerce and Industry in collaboration with the Estonian and Chernihiv Chambers of Commerce and Industry.
news.estonia_description_2:
The members of the Estonian delegation presented their areas of activity and discussed with local entrepreneurs the opportunities for cooperation in various sectors such as electronics, machine engineering, woodworking, construction materials production, textiles, energy-saving and generation technologies, 3D modeling, and process automation.

As part of the business forum, representatives of TM Twinsocks had a unique opportunity to engage with Estonian textile manufacturers, exchange experiences, and discuss potential further collaboration. They explored new markets and opportunities for business growth. This meeting was an important event for our team.

We hope that the negotiations were successful, and the partnerships established will be productive and mutually beneficial.
news.leleka_heading: Leleka Energy EV Charging Station's Year of Operation
news.leleka_description_1:
Electric vehicles are gradually becoming an important part of the modern world. Even Ukrainians, despite the war and the threat of blackouts, have started to buy more 'green' cars.

In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the number of electric vehicles globally. As of November 2023, Ukraine had 75,257 electric vehicles, including 1,806 in Volyn.

In just one year, this number has significantly increased, and on a national level, it has reached nearly 150,000 vehicles, with almost 4,000 of them having Volyn license plates.
news.leleka_description_2:
In our country, the trend of electric car ownership is gaining momentum, and the expansion of high-speed charging stations is a key factor contributing to the popularity of eco-friendly transportation. The fleet of vehicles using alternative fuels is clearly increasing, making it a logical decision to open a business based on electric charging stations.

After analyzing information on the development of the European electric mobility market, studying successful Ukrainian business cases, and considering all unforeseen circumstances due to the wartime situation, we took the risk and last year, thanks to cooperation with the GO TO-U operator in Kovel, installed the first and most powerful charging station in Volyn. The realization of the business plan became possible thanks to state support, particularly the favorable position within the state program “Affordable Loans 5-7-9%” from AB “Ukrgasbank”. Our charging station is equipped with a high-speed charging unit with a capacity of 120 kW and the following connectors:

- CCS2 - 100 kW,

- GB/T DC - 100 kW,

- CHAdeMO - 50 kW,

- Type 2 - 22 kW.
news.leleka_description_3:
Its location is also optimal for customers. The charging station is located in Kovel at Shevchenka St. 28, just a few minutes' drive from the international highway ‘Kyiv - Kovel - Yagodyn’, as well as the regional roads ‘Kovel - Lutsk’ and ‘Kovel - Lviv’.

In one year of operation, our charging station has charged 3,765 vehicles, which reduced CO2 emissions by nearly 100 tons. Isn't that a positive result? It is clear that the future of electric cars is inevitable. Sooner or later, all drivers will feel the ‘benefits’ of using a ‘clean electric car’ and choose eco-friendly transportation. And we will do everything we can to contribute to this by actively developing the infrastructure.

While your vehicle charges at our station, you can enjoy a delicious meal and a fragrant coffee at the 'Beerton' cafe https://www.instagram.com/_beerton/, visit the craft fish shop 'RibaLove' https://www.instagram.com/rybalove_shop/, or even 'find your pair' at the textile shop 'TWINSOCKS-MARKET' https://twinsocks.com.ua/. So, enjoy the convenience and confidence at every stage of your journey with us in Kovel at Shevchenka St. 28. We also invite you to visit our charging station in Kyiv at Bandera St. 34V (TC Blockbuster) https://maps.app.goo.gl/tvsVCee9zXLA7zHJ7?g_st=it.

We are nearby – happy to welcome you!
news.birthday_heading: 25 Years Together: Yukon Celebrates Its Anniversary
news.birthday_description:
Dear colleagues and partners!

This year, our business turns 25 — a quarter-century of hard work, challenges, and achievements. The last three years have been a true test of resilience for all of us, but we have stood strong, supported one another, and continue moving forward.

We thank each of you for your dedication, strength of spirit, and belief in our shared mission. Together, we don't just work — we create the future!

Best wishes, Yukon!
news.pool_heading: Support for Children at the Memory Tournament of Yevhen Kondratiovych
news.pool_description:
PP "Yukon Company", exclusive representative of TM "Morshynska" and TM "Myrhorodska" in the Volyn region, always strives to be an active participant in social initiatives that promote health and the harmonious development of youth.

One such important event was the 12th Memory Tournament of Yevhen Kondratiovych, which took place on March 28-29, 2025, in Kovel https://tinyurl.com/mryzepu8. This tournament, dedicated to the legendary coach, brought together 150 young athletes from the Volyn, Rivne, and Lviv regions. For them, it was not only an opportunity to compete, but also to honor the great mentor.
news.pool_description_2:
Our company had the honor of being the tournament sponsor and taking care of the physical comfort of its participants. We provided children with water "Morshynska", as clean and healthy water is the foundation of a healthy lifestyle.

Why is this important to us?

We believe that children's health is the future of the country. Regular physical activity, competition, and sports build strength, endurance, and discipline in the younger generation. That’s why we support such initiatives, as they not only help develop athletic talents but also teach children healthy habits.

We are proud to have been part of this event and to have made it even more comfortable for young athletes. Going forward, Yukon Company will continue to support projects that promote health, sports development, and the well-being of our communities.

Together – for a healthy future!
news.forum_heading: Forum of Eco-Industrial Parks of Ukraine 10.04.25
news.forum_description:
As always, we are actively seeking innovation and business development. The 'Yukon' team attended the Forum of Eco-Industrial Parks of Ukraine, which took place on April 10, 2025, in Kyiv.

This is a powerful platform created to discuss the future of Ukraine's industry through the lens of the circular economy, green investments, and sustainable development.

The event was organized by the United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) as part of the implementation of the project 'Global Eco-Industrial Parks Programme II – Ukraine: National Component' (GEIPP II), which is being implemented with the support of the Government of Switzerland through the State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO) in partnership with the Ministry of Economy of Ukraine.

…to be continued.

#GEIPP #SustainableDevelopment #EcoIndustrialParks

#CircularEconomy #UNIDOUkraine #UkraineRecovery

#MinistryOfEconomyOfUkraine #SECO #Twinsocks #FishLove
news.fish_heading: Debut Presentation of TM "RybaLove" at WorldFood GastroDays 2025
news.fish_description:
From April 9 to 10, 2025, Yukon had the honor of participating in a large-scale event — the second WorldFood GastroDays 2025 and Tea&Coffee Shop exhibition, which took place in Kyiv at the International Exhibition Center.

This is the No.1 event for everyone working in the food industry, HoReCa, food supply, ingredients, and food production safety. It is a platform where producers, suppliers, food safety experts, restaurateurs, investors, technologists, and everyone committed to delivering quality service and taste in public catering establishments gathered.

At the exhibition, our team proudly presented the trademark "RybaLove" and our own production of Clarias catfish. Our booth attracted visitors with its quality and a fresh approach to fish culture in Ukraine.
news.fish_description_2:
We offered various types of craft products for shops, supermarkets, restaurants, and cafes, and shared our farming and production processes that meet European standards of quality, environmental friendliness, and taste safety.

For us, participating in WorldFood GastroDays was not just a debut presentation of our products at such a high-level event, but also a platform for new connections and discoveries. It was an incredible opportunity to talk to professionals and exchange experiences. Together with colleagues, we discussed current market challenges and their solutions, shared our insights, and learned new things.

We are glad to have had the opportunity to speak directly with our clients, partners, and potential customers, receive feedback, discuss joint projects, and share our vision for the industry's future. We are grateful to the exhibition organizers for their excellent preparation, and to everyone who visited our stand — your support and interest inspire us to improve and grow.

The present and the future: the whole world needs delicious food and positive emotions. That’s exactly what we’re working on!
news.easter_heading: Christ is Risen! Greetings from the 'PF Yukon' team
news.easter_description_1:
Happy Easter!

We wish you peace, kindness, and victory. May this bright holiday fill your hearts with hope, your soul with peace, and your home with warmth and happiness.

May the Lord protect you and your loved ones, granting you health, strength of spirit, and inspiration for new achievements.
news.soccer_turnament_description_1:
Last weekend, the first all-Ukrainian football tournament took place in Volyn, featuring active military personnel and war veterans – “Defenders' Tournament” https://www.facebook.com/DepVetLutsk.

This event was initiated by the Ministry of Veterans Affairs of Ukraine in cooperation with the Ukrainian Football Association. Over the course of two days, an incredible competition unfolded across fields in Boratyn, Zaborol, and Lutsk, where 8 of the strongest teams from 7 regions of Western Ukraine competed for the cup.
news.soccer_turnament_description_2:
This match is more than just a sporting event; it is a gesture of support and adaptation for defenders who find strength and inspiration for life ahead. The participants are people who once held weapons instead of a ball – people who proved their loyalty to Ukraine through their actions.

We are proud to be part of such an important event. On behalf of the Yukon group of companies, we wanted to support every player. That’s why we provided all participants with high-quality drinking water — so that athletes feel they are not alone, that they are needed, and so that organizers know they have someone to rely on.
news.soccer_turnament_description_3:
So let’s continue to unite, support, and help — thereby strengthening our shared defense capability through team spirit, unity, and sincere friendship!

We support our heroes! Together – we are a great force!

- They held weapons, not a ball: Volyn hosts the “Defenders' Tournament” for the first time. https://shorturl.at/Swi6s

- The “Crusaders” from Lutsk won the Western Division of the “Defenders' Tournament”. https://shorturl.at/wS9M3

- The group stage of the “West” division has begun https://shorturl.at/FQy0Z
news.svitiaz_heading: A person lives on as long as the memory of them lives in our hearts…
news.svitiaz_description_1:
The war does not let any of us relax, echoing daily in the news, posts, and phone calls... Many of our loved ones and friends are there..., some are already here..., and some have soared into the sky to join the Heavenly Hundred Legion...

Today, it is the sacred duty of every Ukrainian to honor and preserve the memory of those who gave the most precious thing – their lives – for the peace and calm of our country!
news.svitiaz_description_2:
Last Sunday, the Svitiaz Memorial Marathon for Fallen Heroes 2025 took place in Volyn https://shorturl.at/pYekB. Its goal was to honor the Heroes of Ukraine and raise funds for the Armed Forces.

The company 'Yukon' has always supported sports and a healthy lifestyle, and since the beginning of the full-scale invasion – also the Armed Forces of Ukraine. That’s why we also joined the organization of this important event by providing sponsorship support.
news.svitiaz_description_3:
By covering a certain distance, each participant of the run dedicated it to a specific Hero, sharing their courage, bravery, and spirit of struggle. We dedicated our donation to the memory of our fallen military colleagues: Dmytro Kondratovych, Marko Danyliuk, Vadym Kovalchuk, Maksym Khatsar, Petro Kanoniko, and all those warriors who died defending us and their native land…

Eternal memory to you, Heroes!

Peaceful skies to us all!

Nearly 100,000 UAH was raised for the military at the “Svitiaz Memorial Marathon 2025”:https://shorturl.at/JdtV9
news.workers_description_1:
Dear colleagues!

I sincerely congratulate you on your professional holiday — Trade Workers' Day!

Every day, you put your work, experience, and resilience into what supports the country’s economy, provides people with goods and services, and offers stability and trust to partners. In challenging conditions, you remain strong, adaptable, and humane. That’s why your work is not just business, but a vital contribution to the country.

I wish you grateful customers, reliable partners, smooth logistics, and financial stability. And, of course, peace — because trade loves calm, not standstills.

Happy holiday! Glory to Ukraine!
news.theBest_description_1:
Yukon has been successfully operating in the distribution market for a quarter of a century, annually expanding its product range and improving its cooperation approaches. We are proud to represent products from leading manufacturers and well-known brands, ensuring high-quality goods for our customers.

One of our reliable partners is LLC "Gadz" — a producer of natural juices, purees, dried fruits, fruit chips, and other eco-delicacies https://fg-gadz.com.ua/produktsiia.

For the third year in a row, Yukon Company has been supplying TM "Gadz" products to store shelves in the Volyn region, providing customers with natural and healthy products.
news.theBest_description_2:
Recently, Serhii Khacer (head of the structural unit), along with his sales team, went on a tour to the "Gadz" enterprise to get better acquainted with the production process and the partner brand’s philosophy. https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063481871849&locale=uk_UA.

This trip was a great opportunity to see all stages of production — from growing and harvesting fruits in orchards to packaging and storing finished products. The participants were especially impressed by the scale of the production facilities, modern equipment, and high quality standards maintained at every stage. During the tour, our employees had the opportunity not only to learn more about the processes of product processing and the production of juices, purees, dried fruits, and other TM "Gadz" products but also to communicate directly with company representatives, ask questions, and share collaboration experiences.

This visit further strengthened our confidence in the quality of the products and the importance of partnership with a brand that values naturalness, innovation, and responsible production. Now, having a deeper understanding of TM "Gadz"'s concept, our sales representatives will be able to communicate the value of the products even more effectively to end consumers. After all, our goal is not just sales, but building trust in the brand through quality communication and a high level of service.
news.food_heading: Partnership in Action: We Witnessed How a Brand Is Created
news.food_description_1:
‘Yukon Company’ LLC has been cooperating with ‘Delta Food’ LLC (https://delta-food.ua/) for many years and is the official distributor of TM ‘Hulyai-pole’ products in the Volyn region. Our sales representatives make sure every day that the shelves of stores are always stocked with sunflower oil, mayonnaise, ketchup, and mustard of this beloved brand among many consumers.

In 2015 and 2020, for our significant contribution to the development of the ‘Delta’ and ‘Hulyai-pole’ brands, we were awarded the ‘Best Partner’ award from the manufacturer, which testifies to the high professionalism of our distribution team and the strength of our partnership relations.
news.food_description_2:
The management of our company has repeatedly visited the production facilities of ‘Delta Food’ in Hulyai Pole, Zaporizhzhia region, where the main operations of the enterprise were carried out until 2022.

However, due to russia’s armed aggression against Ukraine, our partners were forced to look for new opportunities to continue their work. As a result, a new production line for TM ‘Hulyai-pole’ products was opened in the village of Ostriv in the Ternopil region.

It is here that the ‘Western Ukrainian Industrial Hub’ industrial park operates, established in 2022 to attract enterprises specializing in agricultural processing, food production, and logistics. Thanks to its developed infrastructure — industrial premises, energy capacities, and transport hubs — the park has become an important center of regional economic development, supporting relocated enterprises and encouraging new investors.
news.food_description_3:
At the end of September, representatives of ‘Yukon Company’ visited the partner enterprise to personally see the new production facilities, learn about working conditions, and explore the technological equipment used to manufacture the products we promote and sell to retail outlets.

During the visit, we were convinced that despite all challenges, ‘Delta Food’ not only maintained the high quality of its products but also reached a new level in implementing modern technologies and organizing production processes.

A particularly strong impression was made by the comprehensive approach to quality control — from the careful selection of raw materials to the automated packaging of finished products. We also had the opportunity to talk with the company’s team, who work hard every day to ensure that every bottle of oil or pack of mayonnaise meets the brand’s high standards.

‘Delta Food’ does not stop at what has been achieved — the company continues to improve its processes, experiment with new approaches, and focus on consumer needs.

‘Yukon Company’ will continue to proudly represent TM ‘Hulyai-pole’ products in the Volyn market, supporting a Ukrainian manufacturer that, despite the war, managed to adapt, preserve jobs, and continue to develop successfully.
news.export_heading: Our business — on the path to the global market
news.export_description_1:
On October 8–9 in Lutsk, a two-day offline intensive Go Export https://business.diia.gov.ua/events/go-export-intensyv-dlia-pidpryiemtsiv-volynskoi-oblasti|business.diia.gov.ua took place, gathering representatives of Ukrainian business ready to scale their operations internationally. The event became a true hub of practical knowledge, expert insights, and new opportunities.

The event was organized on the initiative of the Volyn Regional State Administration https://voladm.gov.ua/article/go-export-intensiv-dlya-pidpriyemciv-volinskoyi-oblasti|voladm.gov.ua and Lutsk City Council https://www.instagram.com/p/DPnrg5QDeRZ/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link|instagram.com in cooperation with the Office for Entrepreneurship and Export Development https://www.facebook.com/share/p/1DAAGn6J17|facebook.com, Diia.Business Lutsk, and the Volyn Chamber of Commerce and Industry https://www.facebook.com/share/p/1GCRwD2qqs|facebook.com.
news.export_description_2:
LLC “Twinsocks” is actively developing and confidently moving forward https://twinsocks.com.ua/?srsltid=AfmBOopSo2LDWMI5ugnUvBNmrr849ZP5RpMy9d4FMIidUtYeaFwduorz|twinsocks.com.ua. We are convinced: growth is continuous learning, adaptation, and exchange of experience. That’s why members of our team participate in key business events that promote the company’s growth and open new horizons. During the Go Export intensive, our company was represented by Deputy Director Iryna Cherniak and Regional Development Manager Oleh Yurchyk.

Participation in Go Export opened access for us to the practical information necessary for the effective start and development of export activities. We acquired valuable knowledge on entering international markets, tools for state support of exporters, and had a great opportunity to talk with experts in foreign economic activity and exchange experience with colleagues from the business community of Volyn.
news.export_description_3:
The speakers included seasoned specialists in international trade, lawyers, logisticians, marketers, and export consultants. Their advice, real cases, and practical tools gave us a new vision of our product’s development potential in the global market.

Go Export is more than just training. It’s new ideas, inspiration, contacts, and concrete solutions that we have already begun integrating into our development strategy. We sincerely thank the organizers for the opportunity to become part of this powerful business movement. We are confident that such events shape the export community of the future.

We move forward! We think globally! We act decisively!

form.heading: INTERESTED IN OUR OFFER? FILL OUT THE FORM SO WE CAN CONTACT YOU

career.heading: Join Our Team
career.description: We are looking for talented and motivated professionals who are eager for professional development and ready to grow with us. If you have a desire to learn, take on new challenges, and share our values and corporate culture, we are happy to offer you opportunities for both professional and personal growth. Join us and together we will create the future!
